card.text: I/We request that ANZ issue me/us with a debit card to access the account.

privacy.text: I/We have read and accept the Privacy and confidentiality conditions.

promotionalMaterial.text: I/We wish to receive promotional material (including promotional electronic messages) from time to time about products and services of ANZ, its subsidiaries and corporate partners.

taxResidency.text: I/We will let you know within 30 days if my/our tax residency details change.

termsAndConditions.text:
I/We have read and accept the ANZ Saving & Transaction Products - Terms and Conditions, ANZ Personal Banking Account Fees and Charges booklet and the Financial Services Guide for this/these product(s) and I/we agree to receive these documents by accessing them electronically from www.anz.com.

I/We agree to ANZ charging me the monthly account service fee on the ANZ Access Advantage account which is currently $5.

I acknowledge that in consenting to receive these documents electronically that:

  • I/We will not receive a paper copy of these documents;
  • I/We must check my/our electronic communications regularly;
  • I/We may retain copies of these documents by printing or saving these documents; and
  • I/We can vary my/our nominated email address, request a paper copy of these documents, or withdraw my/our consent to receiving these documents electronically at any time by calling 13 13 14
